caption.center: Carroll O. WILSON and Edith M. Wilson, Appellants, v. Henrietta

opinion.posture: Appeal from Jefferson Circuit Court; Richard A. Revell, Judge.

Benjamin Mazin, H. Bemis Lawrence and William W. Lawrence, Louisville, for appellants.

opinion.opinion_text:
Memorandum Opinion of the Court by Justice OSBORNE, Affirming on Appeal and Cross-Appeal.[fn*]
